EmailTemplate.subject: Ovation Select - 100 Customers and Counting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
With more than 100 customers using Ovation Select® today, it’s astonishing how many CL604 operators are still flying today with outdated systems on their airplane.
“Thanks to Honeywell’s commitment and technical skill we now have a truly bespoke system that uses every last bit of functionality available, fully integrated with all of our other on board systems.” -- Brian Hazen, director of maintenance
So what are you waiting for? The time has never been better to join more than 100 customers who are using Ovation Select today and add a new level of functionality to your CL604.
Contact Constant Aviation today to learn more about Honeywell’s Ovation Select CMS for Challenger 604.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Constant-Aviation_Ovation-Select.html]]>
